metadata.name: Adequate Descriptions
metadata.description: Realistic entries with sufficient detail from a busy teacher

formData.incident_description: Alex bumped heads with a friend while they were on the Playground
formData.injury_description: Small red bump on his forehead No cut but slight swelling. He cried for about 2 minutes but calmed down quickly.
formData.action_taken: Applied ice pack for 5 mins and gave him lots of cuddles. Sat with him in the quiet corner until he felt ready to play again
